shortdesc.ph: Used to set beauty enhancement parameters for filter effects.
Sets the face beautification effect area and intensity.

plentry.pd: Enhancement intensity. The definition of intensity differs for different facial areas, such as direction, range, and preset values.

Beautification area. Different areas correspond to different facial adjustment effects, such as head scaling, facial feature proportions, etc. Available values include:
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_NONE (-1): Invalid area.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_HEADSCALE (100): Head scaling.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_FOREHEAD (101): Forehead adjustment.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_FACECONTOUR (102): Face contour.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_FACELENGTH (103): Face length adjustment.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_FACEWIDTH (104): Face width adjustment.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_CHEEKBONE (105): Cheekbone adjustment.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_CHEEK (106): Cheek adjustment.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_MANDIBLE (107): Jaw adjustment.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_CHIN (108): Chin adjustment.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_EYESCALE (200): Eye size.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_EYEDISTANCE (201): Eye distance adjustment.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_EYEPOSITION (202): Vertical eye position.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_EYELID (203): Lower eyelid adjustment.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_EYEPUPILS (204): Pupil size.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_EYEINNERCORNER (205): Inner eye corner adjustment.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_EYEOUTERCORNER (206): Outer eye corner adjustment.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_NOSELENGTH (300): Nose length.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_NOSEWIDTH (301): Nose width.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_NOSEWING (302): Nostril size.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_NOSEROOT (303): Nose root size.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_NOSEBRIDGE (304): Nose bridge size.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_NOSETIP (305): Nose tip size.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_NOSEGENERAL (306): Overall nose shape.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_MOUTHSCALE (400): Mouth size.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_MOUTHPOSITION (401): Mouth position.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_MOUTHSMILE (402): Mouth corner curvature.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_MOUTHLIP (403): Lip size.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_EYEBROWPOSITION (500): Eyebrow position.
FACE_SHAPE_AREA_EYEBROWTHICKNESS (501): Eyebrow thickness.
Beautification intensity. The intensity definitions for different areas include direction, range, default value, etc.
